Hardware
  HP41CV
  82132A - Printer
  82104A - Card Reader
  82161A - Tape drive (with needed 82160A IL)
  82180A - Extended Functions/Memory
  82182A - Time Module

Catalog 2 - Peripheral Functions
Card Reader Commands
  RDTA    Read data from card
  RDTAX   Read data from card according to X (bbb.eee)
  VER     Verify card
  WALL    Write all to cards
  WDTA    Write data to card
  WDTAX   Write data to card according to X (bbb.eee)
  WSTS    Write status registers to card
  7CLREG  Clear P0-P9,A-E,I (R00-R09,R20-R25)
  7DSP0   Set display to 0 decimal places
  7DSP1   Set display to 1 decimal places
  7DSP2   Set display to 2 decimal places
  7DSP3   Set display to 3 decimal places
  7DSP4   Set display to 4 decimal places
  7DSP5   Set display to 5 decimal places
  7DSP6   Set display to 6 decimal places
  7DSP7   Set display to 7 decimal places
  7DSP8   Set display to 8 decimal places
  7DSP9   Set display to 9 decimal places
  7DSPI   Set decimal places to value stored in I (R25)
  7DSZ    Decrement I and skip on zero
  7DSZI   Decrement I indirect and skip on zero
  7ENG    Set display to engineering mode
  7FIX    Set display to fixes mode
  7ISZ    Increment I and skip on zero
  7ISZI   Increment I indirect and skip on zero
  7P<>S   Exchange primary and secondary registers
  7SCI    Set display to scientific mode

Extended Functions Commands
  ALENG      Length of Alpha register
  ANUM       Retrieve number from Alpha register
  APPCHR     Append Alpha register to current record
  APPREC     Append Alpha register to current ascii file
  ARCLREC    Append record to Alpha register
  AROT       Rotate Alpha register
  ATOX       Leftmost character of Alpha shifted out to X
  CLFL       Clear file
  CLKEYS     Clear all key assignments
  CRFLAS     Create ascii file
  CRFLD      Create data file
  DELCHR     Delete characters from current pointer in ascii fil
  DELREC     Delete current record
  EMDIR      Directory of extended memory
  FLSIZE     Size of specified file in X
  GETAS      Get ascii file from tape
  GETP       Get program from extended memory, replace last program in main memory
  GETR       Get all data registers from data file
  GETREC     Get record from ascii file
  GETRX      Get data registers from file according to X
  GETSUB     Get program from extended memory to end of main memory
  GETX       Get X from data file
  INSCHR     Insert Alpha register at current character position
  INSREC     Insert record before current record
  PASN       Programmable key assignment
  PCLPS      Delete specified program to end of main memory
  POSA       Position of charater/string in alpha register
  POSFL      Search file for string in Alpha
  PSIZE      Programmable SIZE
  PURFL      Purge file from extended memory
  RCLFLAG    Recall flags 00-43
  RCLPT      Recall current file pointer
  RCLPTA     Set working file and recall pointers
  REGMOVE    Copy data registers (X=sss.dddnnn)
  REGSWAP    Swap block of registers (X=sss.dddnnn)
  SAVEAS     Save Ascii file to tape
  SAVEP      Save program to extended memory
  SAVER      Save all data registers to file
  SAVERX     Save registers according to X to file
  SAVEX      Save X to data file
  SEEKPT     Position pointer in currect data file
  SEEKPTA    Position pointer in named data file
  SIZE?      Get current SIZE value
  STOFLAG    Store flags 00-43 (or X=bb.ee, Y=flags)
  X<>F       Exchange X with Flags 0-7
  XTOA       Append string/char in X to Alpha

TimeModule
  ADATE      Append date to alpha register
  ATIME      Append time to alpha register
  ATIME24    Append time in 24 hour format to alpha register
  CLK12      Set clock to 12 hour mode
  CLK24      Set clock to 24 hour mode
  CLKT       Set clock display to time only
  CLKTD      Set clock display to time/date
  CLOCK      Activate clock mode
  CORRECT    Set time and auto set accuracy factor
  DATE       Get current Date into X
  DATE+      Add X days to date Y
  DDAYS      Days between dates
  DOW        Get day of week for date in X
  DMY        Det Day Month Year format
  MDY        Set Month Day Year format
  RCLAF      Recall accuracy factor
  RCLSW      Recaall current stopwatch value
  RUNSW      Start halted stopwatch
  SETAF      Set accuracy factor
  SETDATE    Set current date
  SETIME     Set current time
  SETSW      Set stopwatch time
  STOPSW     Stop the stopwatch
  SW         Activate stopwatch mode
  T+X        Adjust current time
  TIME       Get current Time into X
Note: The simulation uses the host computer clock, so RCLAF will always
      return 0, and SETAF will be ignored

Printer Commands
  ACA        Accumulate alpha register to print buffer
  ACCHR      Accumulate ascii character of X to print buffer (EX. 65='A')
  ACCOL      Accumulate column
  ACSPEC     Accumulate special character
  ACX        Accumulate numeric value of X to print buffer
  BLDSPEC    Build special character
  LIST       List program lines
  PRA        Print alpha register
  PRBUF      Print and clear print buffer
  PRE        Print statistic registers
  PRFLAGS    Print flags
  PRKEYS     Print user mode key assignments
  PRP "name" Print Program
  PRREG      Print all registers
  PRREGX     Print registers according to X (bbb.eee)
  PRSTK      Print stack
  PRX        Print X register
  SKPCHR     Accumulate X spaces to print buffer
  SKPCOL     Accumulate X blank columns to printe buffer

Tape Drive commands
  CREATE     Create data file (*1)
  DIR        Display directory of tape
  NEWM ___   Initialize media, prompts for dir entries (8-447)
  PURGE      Delete a file (*2)
  READA      Read all from file (*2)
  READK      Read key assignments from file (*2)
  READP      Read program from tape (*2)
  READR      Read data registers from file (*2)
  READRX     Read data from file according to X (*3)
  READS      Read calculator status from file (*2)
  READSUB    Read program from tape (*2)
  RENAME     Rename a file (*4)
  SEC        Mark file as secured (read only)(*2)
  SEEKR      Set current data pointer for data read/write (*5)
  UNSEC      Unsecure file (read/write)(*2)
  VERIFY     Verify file (*2)
  WRTA       Write all to file (*2)
  WRTK       Write key assignments to file (*2)
  WRTP       Write program to file (*6)
  WRTPV      Write program to file as private (*6) Not currently supported
  WRTR       Write data registers to file (file must exist)(*2)
  WRTRX      Write data registers to file according to X (*3)
  WRTS       Write calculator status to file (*2)
  ZERO       Zero all registers in file (*2)
  *1 Alpha=filename, X=size is registers
  *2 Alpha=filename
  *3 X=bbb.eee (File must have been positioned before this call)
  *4 Alpha=oldname,newname
  *5 Alpha=filename, X=register position
  *6 Alpha=prgmname,filename OR Alpha=prgmname OR Alpha=,filename

Catalog 3 - Standard Functions
+         Addition operator
-         Subtraction operator
*         Multiplication operator
/         Division operator
1/X       Reciprical
10^X      Common antilogarithm
ABS       Absolute value
ACOS      Arccosine
ADV
AOFF      Alpha mode off
AON       Alpha mode on
ARCL __   Alpha recall
ASHF      Alpha shift
ASIN      Arcsine
ASN       Assign key
ASTO __   Alpha store
ATAN      Arctangent
AVIEW     Alpha view
BEEP      beep
BST       Backstep
CAT _     Catalog
CF __     Clear flag
CHS       Change sign
CLA       Clear alpha
CLD       Clear display
CLE       Clear statistics registers
CLP       Clear program
CLRG      Clear registers
CLST      Clear stack
CLX       Clear X register
COS       Cosine
D-R       Degrees to radians
DEC       Octal to decimal conversion
DEG       Degrees mode
DEL ___   Delete program lines
DSE __    Decrement, skip if equal
E^X       Natural antilogarithm
E^X-1     Natural antilogarithm for arguments close to 0
END       End program
ENG _     Engineering notation
ENTER^    Push X
FACT      Factorial
FC? __    Flag clear test
FC?C __   Flag clear test and clear
FIX _     Fixed point display
FRC       Fractional portion of number
FS? __    Flag set test
FS?C __   Flag set and clear
GRAD      Gradians mode
GTO __    Go to label
HMS       Decimal hours to hours/minutes/seconds
HMS+      Hours/minutes/seconds addition
HMS-      Hours/minutes/seconds subtraction
HR        Hours/minutes/seconds to decimal hours
INT       Integer portion of number
ISG __    Increment, skip of greater
LASTX     Recall last X register to X register
LBL __    Program label
LOG       Common logarithm
LN        Natural logarithm
LN1+X     Natural logarithm for arguments close to 1
MEAN      Statistical mean
MOD       Modulo
OCT       Convert decimal to octal
OFF       Turn of calculator
ON        -------------------------
P-R       Polar to rectangular conversion
PACK      Pack program memory
%         Percent
%CH       Percentage of change
PI        The value of Pi
PROMPT    Stop execution, show alpha register
PSE       Pause (not implemented)
R^        Roll up stack
R-D       Radians to degrees conversion
R-P       Rectangular to polar conversion
RAD       Set radians mode
RCL __    Recall from data register
RDN       Roll down stack
RND       Round
RTN       Return from subroutine
SDEV      Standard deviation
SCI _     Set scientific display
SF __     Set flag
E+        Accumulations for statistics
E-        Accumulations corrections
EREG __   Select start of statistics registers
SIN       sine
SIGN      Sign of x
SIZE ___  Set size for data registers
SQRT      Square root
SST       Single step
ST+ __    Storage register addition
ST- __    Storage register subtraction
ST* __    Storage register multiplication
ST/ __    Storage register division
STO __    Store to data register
STOP      Stop execution
TAN       Tangent
TONE _    Tone (does nothing)
VIEW __   View data register
X=0?      Conditional test for x equal 0
X<>0?     Conditional test for x unequal 0
X<0?      Conditional test for x less than 0
X<=0?     Conditional test for x less than or equal to 0
X>0?      Conditional test for x greater than 0
X=Y?      Conditional test for x equals y
X<>Y?     Conditional test for x unequal to y
X<Y?      Conditional test for x less than y
X<=Y?     Conditional test for x less than or equal to y
X>Y?      Conditional test for x greater than y
X<>       Exchange x with data register
X<>Y      Exchange x and y
XEQ __    Execute subroutine
X^2       Square x
Y^X       Y raised to the power of x

HP41 -> Hp67/97
 00  -> P0
 01  -> P1
 02  -> P2
 03  -> P3
 04  -> P4
 05  -> P5
 06  -> P6
 07  -> P7
 08  -> P8
 09  -> P9
 10  -> S0
 11  -> S1
 12  -> S2
 13  -> S3
 14  -> S4 Sum X
 15  -> S5 Sum X^2
 16  -> S6 Sum Y
 17  -> S7 Sum Y^2
 18  -> S8 Sum XY
 19  -> S9 N
 20  -> A
 21  -> B
 22  -> C
 23  -> D
 24  -> E
 25  -> I

Memory:
      6   5   4   3   2   1   0
    +---+---+---+---+---+---+---+
1FF |       Top of memory       |
    |                           |
    |           Data            |
    | R00                       | mno
    +---------------------------+
    |    First user program     |
    |                           |
    |                           |
    |    Last user program      |
    |          .END.            | pqr
    +---------------------------+
    |         Available         |
    |                           |
    +---------------------------+
    |      Key assignments      |
    |                           |
0C0 +---------------------------+

    +---------------------------+
00F |      Status registers     |
000 |                           |
    +---------------------------+

Status Registers:

Status registers
       6       5       4       3       2       1       0     R_     REG_
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
e  | shifted key assignments           |scratch|   line #  | 00F     105
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
d  |         user flags          |      system flags       | 00E      98
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
c  |   E reg   |scratch|   cold    |    R00    |   .END.   | 00D      91
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
b  |3rd ret|    2nd ret    |    1st ret    |    Adr Ptr    | 00C      84
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
a  |    6th ret    |    5th ret    |    4th ret    |3rd ret| 00B      77
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
|- | unshifted key assignments         |      scratch      | 00A      70
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
Q  |               Temporary alpha scratch                 | 009      63
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
P  |     scratch (alpha 25-28)     |      Alpha 22-24      | 008      56
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
O  |                     Alpha 15-21                       | 007      49
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
N  |                     Alpha  8-14                       | 006      42
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
M  |                     Alpha  1-7                        | 005      35
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
L  |                           L                           | 004      28
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
X  |                           X                           | 003      21
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
Y  |                           Y                           | 002      14
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
Z  |                           Z                           | 001       7
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
T  |                           T                           | 000       0
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
   |sgn| mantissa                              |sgn|  exp  |

Flags:
Flags
00-10 - General purpose
   11 - Automatic execution
   12 - Printer double wide
   13 - Printer lowercase
   14 - Card reader overwrite
   21 - Printer enable
   22 - Numeric data input
   23 - Alpha data input
   24 - Range error ignore
   25 - Ignore next error, error clears flag
   26 - Audio enable
   27 - User mode
   28 - Decimal point, S=. C=,
   29 - Digit grouping, C=no commas
   30 - Catalog, always tests clear
   31 - Date mode. S=DMY, C=MDY
32-35 - Peripherals
36-39 - Number of digits (fix, sci, eng) binary, 36=msb
40-41 - Display format (fix=10, sci=00, eng=01) 40=msb
   42 - Grads mode
   43 - Radians mode
   44 - Continuous on, set=no auto power off
   45 - System data entry
   46 - Partial key sequence
   47 - Shift set
   48 - Alpha mode
   49 - Low battery
   50 - Message (displaying error, or view/aview)
   51 - SST
   52 - Program mode
   53 - I/O
   54 - PSE, when set PAUSE is in progress
   55 - Printer existance
       6       5       4       3       2       1       0     R_     REG_
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+
d  |0     0|0     1|1     2|2     3|3     3|4 4 4 4|4     5| 00E      98
   |0     7|8     5|6     3|4     1|2     9|0 3 4 7|8     5| 00E      98
   +---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+---v---+



Display symbol       Printer symbol           Command
       L                                         R^
       M                    [                    RDN
       N                    \                    LASTX
       O                    ]                    CLX
       P                    ^                    X=Y?
       Q                    _                    X<>Y?
       |-                   T                    SIGN
       a                                         X<=0?
       b                                         MEAN
       c                                         SDEV
       d                                         AVIEW
       e                                         CLD

jump .lmn ->  GTO .lmn
              PRGM off
              Press byte jump key
              PRGM on

ejump .lmn -> PRGM off
              RTN
              RCL e
              GTO .lmn
              Press byte jump key
              STO e
              PRGM on

Key assignment keycodes
     09       19       29       39       49
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
  |  01  | |  11  | |  21  | |  31  | |  41  |
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
     0A       1A       2A       3A       4A
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
  |  02  | |  12  | |  22  | |  32  | |  42  |
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
              1B       2B       3B       4B
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
  |      | |  13  | |  23  | |  33  | |  43  |
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
          0C           2C       3C       4C
  +---------------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
  |       44      | |  24  | |  34  | |  44  |
  +---------------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
     0D          1D          2D          3D
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
  |  05  |    |  15  |    |  25  |    |  35  |
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
     0E          1E          2E          3E
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
  |  06  |    |  16  |    |  26  |    |  36  |
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
     0F          1F          2F          3F
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
  |  07  |    |  17  |    |  27  |    |  37  |
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
     10          20          30          40
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
  |  08  |    |  18  |    |  28  |    |  38  |
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+

Key assignment flag bits
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
  |  36  | |  28  | |  20  | |  12  | |   4  |
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+

  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
  |  35  | |  27  | |  19  | |  11  | |   3  |
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+

  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
  |      | |  26  | |  18  | |  10  | |   2  |
  +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+ +------+

  +---------------+ +------+ +------+ +------+
  |       33      | |  17  | |   9  | |   1  |
  +---------------+ +------+ +------+ +------+

  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
  |  32  |    |  24  |    |  16  |    |   8  |
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+

  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
  |  31  |    |  23  |    |  15  |    |   7  |
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+

  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
  |  30  |    |  22  |    |  14  |    |   6  |
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+

  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+
  |  29  |    |  21  |    |  13  |    |   5  |
  +------+    +------+    +------+    +------+

Byte Codes:
Hex  Dec  Function  Postfix  Display
 00    0  NULL          0    Overline
 01    1  LBL 00        1    Full man
 02    2  LBL 01        2    Starburst
 03    3  LBL 02        3    Starburst
 04    4  LBL 03        4    Head, both legs
 05    5  LBL 04        5    Head, both legs, left arm
 06    6  LBL 05        6    Head, left leg
 07    7  LBL 06        7    Starburst
 08    8  LBL 07        8    Starburst
 09    9  LBL 08        9    Starburst
 0A   10  LBL 09       10    Starburst
 0B   11  LBL 10       11    Starburst
 0C   12  LBL 11       12    Micro symbol
 0D   13  LBL 12       13    Angle symbol
 0E   14  LBL 13       14    Starburst
 0F   15  LBL 14       15    Starburst

 10   16  0            16    Starburst
 11   17  1            17    Starburst
 12   18  2            18    Starburst
 13   19  3            19    Starburst
 14   20  4            20    Starburst
 15   21  5            21    Starburst
 16   22  6            22    Starburst
 17   23  7            23    Starburst
 18   24  8            24    Starburst
 19   25  9            25    Starburst
 1A   26  .            26    Starburst
 1B   27  EEX          27    Starburst
 1C   28  CHS          28    Starburst
 1D   29  GTO"         29    Unequal symbol
 1E   30  XEQ"         30    Starburst
 1F   31               31    Starburst

 20   32  RCL 00       32    <space>
 21   33  RCL 01       33    !
 22   34  RCL 02       34    "
 23   35  RCL 03       35    #
 24   36  RCL 04       36    $
 25   37  RCL 05       37    %
 26   38  RCL 06       38    &
 27   39  RCL 07       39    '
 28   40  RCL 08       40    (
 29   41  RCL 09       41    )
 2A   42  RCL 10       42    *
 2B   43  RCL 11       43    +
 2C   44  RCL 12       44    ,
 2D   45  RCL 13       45    -
 2E   46  RCL 14       46    .
 2F   47  RCL 15       47    /

 30   48  STO 00       48    0
 31   49  STO 01       49    1
 32   50  STO 02       50    2
 33   51  STO 03       51    3
 34   52  STO 04       52    4
 35   53  STO 05       53    5
 36   54  STO 06       54    6
 37   55  STO 07       55    7
 38   56  STO 08       56    8
 39   57  STO 09       57    9
 3A   58  STO 10       58    :
 3B   59  STO 11       59    ;
 3C   60  STO 12       60    <
 3D   61  STO 13       61    =
 3E   62  STO 14       62    >
 3F   63  STO 15       63    ?

 40   64  +            64    @
 41   65  -            65    A
 42   66  *            66    B
 43   67  /            67    C
 44   68  X<Y?         68    D
 45   69  X>Y?         69    E
 46   70  X<=Y?        70    F
 47   71  E+           71    G
 48   72  E-           72    H
 49   73  HMS+         73    I
 4A   74  HMS-         74    J
 4B   75  MOD          75    K
 4C   76  %            76    L
 4D   77  %CH          77    M
 4E   78  P-R          78    N
 4F   79  R-P          79    O

 50   80  LN           80    P
 51   81  X^2          81    Q
 52   82  SQRT         82    R
 53   83  Y^X          83    S
 54   84  CHS          84    T
 55   85  e^X          85    U
 56   86  LOG          86    V
 57   87  10^X         87    W
 58   88  e^X-1        88    X
 59   89  SIN          89    Y
 5A   90  COS          90    Z
 5B   91  TAN          91    [
 5C   92  ASIN         92    \
 5D   93  ACOS         93    ]
 5E   94  ATAN         94    ^
 5F   95  DEC          95    _

 60   96  1/X          96    Text symbol
 61   97  ABS          97    a
 62   98  FACT         98    b
 63   99  X<>0?        99    c
 64  100  X>0?        100    d
 65  101  LN1+X       101    e
 66  102  X<0?          A    Starburst
 67  103  X=0?          B    Starburst
 68  104  INT           C    Starburst
 69  105  FRC           D    Starburst
 6A  106  D-R           E    Starburst
 6B  107  R-D           F    Starburst
 6C  108  HMS           G    Starburst
 6D  109  HR            H    Starburst
 6E  110  RND           I    Starburst
 6F  111  OCT           J    Starburst

 70  112  CLE           T    Starburst
 71  113  X<>Y          Z    Starburst
 72  114  PI            Y    Starburst
 73  115  CLST          X    Starburst
 74  116  R^            L    Starburst
 75  117  RDN           M    Starburst
 76  118  LASTX         N    Starburst
 77  119  CLX           O    Starburst
 78  120  X=Y?          P    Starbust
 79  121  X<>Y?         Q    Starburst
 7A  122  SIGN          |-   Text symbol
 7B  123  X<=0?         a    Starburst
 7C  124  MEAN          b    Starburst
 7D  125  SDEV          c    Starburst
 7E  126  AVIEW         d    Summation symbol
 7F  127  CLD           e    Append symbol

 80  128  DEG         IND 00 All remaining are starbursts
 81  129  RAD         IND 01
 82  130  GRAD        IND 02
 83  131  ENTER^      IND 03
 84  132  STOP        IND 04
 85  133  RTN         IND 05
 86  134  BEEP        IND 06
 87  135  CLA         IND 07
 88  136  ASHF        IND 08
 89  137  PSE         IND 09
 8A  138  CLRG        IND 10
 8B  139  AOFF        IND 11
 8C  140  AON         IND 12
 8D  141  OFF         IND 13
 8E  142  PROMPT      IND 14
 8F  143  ADV         IND 15

 90  144  RCL __      IND 16
 91  145  STO __      IND 17
 92  146  ST+ __      IND 18
 93  147  ST- __      IND 19

Tape Drive - 28
 A7 01    CREATE  - XROM 28,01
 A7 02    DIR     - XROM 28,02
 A7 03    NEWM    - XROM 28,03
 A7 04    PURGE   - XROM 28,04
 A7 05    READA   - XROM 28,05
 A7 06    READK   - XROM 28,06
 A7 07    READP   - XROM 28,07
 A7 08    READR   - XROM 28,08
 A7 09    READRX  - XROM 28,09
 A7 0A    READS   - XROM 28,10
 A7 0B    READSUB - XROM 28,11
 A7 0C    RENAME  - XROM 28,12
 A7 0D    SEC     - XROM 28,13
 A7 0E    SEEKR   - XROM 28,14
 A7 0F    UNSEC   - XROM 28,15

 A7 11    WRTA    - XROM 28,17
 A7 12    WRTK    - XROM 28,18
 A7 13    WRTP    - XROM 28,19
 A7 14    WRTPV   - XROM 28,20
 A7 15    WRTR    - XROM 28,21
 A7 16    WRTRX   - XROM 28,22
 A7 17    WRTS    - XROM 28,23
 A7 18    ZERO    - XROM 28,24
Tape contains 512 sectors of 256 bytes each

Printer characters:
0  ..... 1  ..... 2  ***** 3  ..... 4  ..... 5  .***. 6  ***** 7  ..*..  1

   .***.    .*.*.    *...*    .*...    .**.*    ****.    *....    ..*..  4

   ..*..    .****    .***.    .*...    .*..*    ...*.    ....*    .***.  4
